code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{endpoints}from'../config';import'./Education.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Education=()=>{const[education,setEducation]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{fetch(endpoints.education).then(res=>res.json()).then(data=>setEducation(data)).catch(error=>console.error('Error fetching education:',error));},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"section-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"section-title",children:"Education"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"education-grid",children:education.map((edu,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card education-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"education-degree",children:edu.degree}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"education-institute",children:edu.institute}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"education-details",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"education-year",children:edu.year}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"education-grade",children:["CGPA: ",edu.cgpa]})]})]},index))})]});};export default Education;
